title: Elon Musk mulls merging SpaceX with artificial intelligence firm xAI: report
description: Elon Musk is reportedly in “advanced talks” to merge his rocket company SpaceX with his artificial intelligence firm xAI.
content:
Elon Musk is reportedly in “advanced talks” to merge his rocket company SpaceX with his artificial intelligence firm xAI.
The two entities, each of which are privately held, have told some of their investors about the plans, Bloomberg reported Monday... [1655 chars]

content:

title: Indonesia allows AI chatbot under tight supervision
description: Indonesia allowed Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence chatbot Grok to resume operations in the country on a conditional basis and under strict supervision, weeks after banning it for explicit sexual content.
